name: LD48 Deeper & Deeper
description:
Door Door inspired PICO8 game.

Built for  Compo, and did not get everything finished. You can win if you make your way though the maze. You'll have to go deeper by going though doors.

Move through doors by sliding them open first, then entering on the open side.

Having trouble going though the door? You need to be on the open side. Try opening the door, then jumping over it so you can come at it from the same side again.
